name: Sweet Dream Succubus - Nightmare Edition
description:
A never ending nightmare. Your life force drains away as a mysterious woman haunts your every waking hour. Can you escape…?
Fill the shoes of a man who is trapped in a seemingly never-ending cycle, reliving the same three days over and over again, all while trying to escape from the clutches of his devilish and sexy succubus assailant.
Sweet Dream Succubus is a collaboration between two major forces in the adult industry.
The veteran erotic artist Doxy and the incredibly beautiful cosplayer and model, Swimsuit Succubus have joined forces to create a sultry interactive visual novel full of thrill and excitement for you to enjoy.
Enjoy Additional Sex Scenes & Artwork. We've gone ahead and added some more juicy meat to the game, including all new fully illustrated scenes.
Explore Additional Story Content. Gain further insight into the dark and mysterious world of Sweet Dream Succubus with brand new character dialogues!
Solve All New Overhauled Puzzles. Undertake a fresh, new challenge as we've remixed and re-balanced lots of enthralling puzzles and riddles!
Updated Location Artworks. We've gone and done a detailed rework on the locations in the game, making lots of great visual improvements!
